Sentencas: This study was aimed at developing a novel integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) with hybrid plasma spraying (HYPS).
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying

Sentencas: HYPS makes it possible to obtain not only very dense yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) films as solid electrolytes, but also porous Ni-YSZ cermets as fuel electrodes and porous La1-xSrxMnO3 (LSMO) films as air electrodes.
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying

Sentencas: The quality of each film was examined individually and the electrical conductivity of the Ni-YSZ and LSMO electrodes was measured.
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying

Sentencas: The fabrication of the entire SOFC by using exclusively HYPS was then demonstrated.
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying

Sentencas: Initially, a 2 mm thick fuel electrode of Ni-YSZ cermet was formed on a boron-nitride substrate, which could be easily removed after deposition.
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying

Sentencas: The electrolyte (YSZ) and the air electrode (LSMO) were then successively deposited on the self-supporting cermet.
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying

Sentencas: By this method the sintering step necessary in the conventional SOFC processing can be omitted, and SOFC cells can be fabricated using only spraying process.
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying

Sentencas: The technical feasibility of the novel SOFC processing was clearly demonstrated by an excellent cell performance.
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying

Sentencas: It showed an open circuit voltage(O.C.V.) value of 1.01 V and a power density of 7.3 x 10(3) W/m(2).
Titulo: Integrated fabrication process for solid oxide fuel cells using hybrid plasma spraying
